remarks: Definition of line in terms of projective map.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2012.)
statement:
isline2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
isline2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
isline2.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
isline2.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
isline2 $p |- ( K e. Lat -> ( X e. N <-> E. p e. A E. q e. A ( p =/= q /\ X = ( M ` ( p .\/ q ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A p q $.
$d K p q $.
$d X p q $.
